entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued February 20 at 4:19PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WARM AND WET CONDITIONS FOR SOUTHWEST ALASKA MIDWEEK... A series of storms moving from the Bering Sea to the Chukchi Sea Tuesday through Thursday will bring southerly winds, warm temperatures, and mixed precipitation to Southwest Alaska this week.
